verses.text: Hear us, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Shepherd \w of|strong="H4210"\w* Israel, who leads Joseph like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flock; You who sit enthroned between \w the|strong="H5329"\w* cherubim, shine forth

\w before|strong="H3427"\w* Ephraim, Benjamin, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Manasseh. Rally \w Your|strong="H7462"\w* mighty \w power|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* save \w us|strong="H3478"\w*.

Restore \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* cause \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* shine \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H3212"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3444"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* saved.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Hosts, how \w long|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* \w anger|strong="H6440"\w* smolder \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* prayers \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* people?

\w You|strong="H5704"\w* fed \w them|strong="H5704"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bread \w of|strong="H3068"\w* tears \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5704"\w* drink \w the|strong="H3068"\w* full measure \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tears.

\w You|strong="H8248"\w* \w make|strong="H8248"\w* \w us|strong="H8248"\w* contend \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w our|strong="H8248"\w* neighbors; \w our|strong="H8248"\w* enemies mock \w us|strong="H8248"\w*.

Restore \w us|strong="H7760"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H7760"\w* Hosts, \w and|strong="H4066"\w* cause \w Your|strong="H7760"\w* face \w to|strong="H7760"\w* shine \w upon|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w*, \w that|strong="H7760"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* may \w be|strong="H7760"\w* saved.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* uprooted \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vine \w from|strong="H7725"\w* Egypt; \w You|strong="H6440"\w* drove \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* transplanted \w it|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w You|strong="H1471"\w* cleared \w the|strong="H1644"\w* ground \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w it|strong="H1644"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w it|strong="H1644"\w* \w took|strong="H5265"\w* root \w and|strong="H4714"\w* filled \w the|strong="H1644"\w* land.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* mountains \w were|strong="H6440"\w* \w covered|strong="H4390"\w* \w by|strong="H6440"\w* \w its|strong="H4390"\w* shade, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mighty cedars \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w its|strong="H4390"\w* branches.

\w It|strong="H3680"\w* sent out \w its|strong="H3680"\w* \w branches|strong="H6057"\w* \w to|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* Sea,\f + \fr 80:11 \ft That is, the Mediterranean Sea, also called the Great Sea\f* \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w its|strong="H3680"\w* shoots toward \w the|strong="H3680"\w* River.\f + \fr 80:11 \ft That is, the Euphrates\f*

Why \w have|strong="H5104"\w* \w You|strong="H7971"\w* broken \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w its|strong="H3220"\w* walls, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* who pass \w by|strong="H5704"\w* pick \w its|strong="H3220"\w* fruit?

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* boar \w from|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* forest ravages \w it|strong="H5674"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* creatures \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* field feed \w upon|strong="H1870"\w* \w it|strong="H5674"\w*.

Return, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H7704"\w* Hosts, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* pray! Look down \w from|strong="H7704"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H7704"\w* see! Attend \w to|strong="H7704"\w* this vineâ€”

\w the|strong="H7200"\w* root \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* \w right|strong="H5027"\w* hand \w has|strong="H6635"\w* planted, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* son \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* raised \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H6635"\w* Yourself.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* vine \w has|strong="H1121"\w* been cut \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* burned; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* perish \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rebuke \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* countenance.

Let \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* hand \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* right hand, \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* son \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* have raised \w up|strong="H8313"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* Yourself.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w turn|strong="H1961"\w* away \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*; revive \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* call \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* name.

Restore \w us|strong="H2421"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Hosts; \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w Your|strong="H4480"\w* face \w to|strong="H7121"\w* shine \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w us|strong="H2421"\w*, \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w saved|strong="H2421"\w*.
